name: Up, Up, and A-Weigh!
description:
In Up, Up, and A-Weigh, you must climb up and collect feathers for score points! Master the art of jumping as you are faced with the challenge of balancing your items on your feet! Do you equally distribute the weight on your feet, rounding out your overall jumping performance, or do you bet it all on one end, jumping like mad on the other?

Controls: Space to determine jump angle and jump power; hold A and D to control the direction of the jump
